Text: you are the man. I have all of these except Sharpe's Christmas but on behalf of all Cornwell fans - thanks. If you can find or post any of Cornwell's thrillers - Scoundrel, Sea Lord,Wildtrack or his other books - Redcoat, Gallow's Thief, I would be ecstatic but even if you can't, your postings are much appreciated.
No problem my friend.  I'll keep my eyes open! ;)
